front.title: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (v3): Schema for Domain Name System (DNS)

abstract.t: This document defines a schema for the Domain Name System(DNS). This schema makes it possible to integrate DNS serverswith an LDAP-based directory service, allowing an organizationto maintain a single store of DNS information. Integration ofDNS into LDAP directories is desirable since it reducesadministrative overhead and eliminates the need to maintainmultiple server centric configuration databases for DNS andother services. It is anticipated that this schema will be useful forproviding a standardized format for the representation ofattributes needed by DNS implementations within LDAP-baseddirectory services.
